Rochester.Mayo Clinic School of Medicine: The Mayo Clinic School of Medicine (MCSOM), formerly known as Mayo Medical School (MMS), is a research-focused medical school based in Rochester, Minnesota, with additional campuses in Phoenix and Scottsdale, Arizona and Jacksonville, Florida. MCSOM is a school within the Mayo Clinic College of Medicine and Science (MCCMS), the teaching arm of Mayo Clinic. MCSOM grants the Doctor of Medicine (M.D.) degree, accredited by the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools and the Liaison Committee on Medical Education.
